column3: Anybody can become angry - that is easy, but to be angry with the right person and to the right degree and at the right time and for the right purpose, and in the right way - that is not within everybody's power and is not easy.

When the whole world is silent, even one voice becomes powerful.
It is certain, in any case, that ignorance, allied with power, is the most ferocious enemy justice can have.
Burning desire to be or do something gives us staying power - a reason to get up every morning or to pick ourselves up and start in again after a disappointment.

Power is of two kinds. One is obtained by the fear of punishment and the other by acts of love. Power based on love is a thousand times more effective and permanent then the one derived from fear of punishment.

You have power over your mind - not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.
Power is like being a lady... if you have to tell people you are, you aren't.
Never allow a person to tell you no who doesn't have the power to say yes.
Mastering others is strength. Mastering yourself is true power.

Never underestimate the power of dreams and the influence of the human spirit. We are all the same in this notion: The potential for greatness lives within each of us.
The less effort, the faster and more powerful you will be.
The only real power comes out of a long rifle.
